attributes.action: Home Secretary Theresa May Must Resign or Be Sacked
attributes.additional_details:
Have MP's forgotten what taking responsibility means?

Someone is in charge, someone gives the orders and the highest person is where the buck stops.

May admits she has no idea how many illegal immigrants got in under her stupidly relaxed rules.

She MUST take responsibility for this and she must either resign or be sacked. People who "pass the buck" have no place in parliament. We need to be able to trust our ELECTED MP's and currently I don't think we can.

Stand up, take responsibility for your failings and resign.
